name: Generous Ginger George, the Gingerbreadman
description:
Everybody loves Christmas - except for one guy: The Grinch!

He has set the stove to high and did a crueful recipe on his own. So all the gingerbreadmen are burned and evil. Christmas is in danger!

Who can save us now? Geneours Ginger George, the Gingerbreadman!

Unfortunately he has no weapons, but he is a clever guy: He throws pieces of himself to knock down the evil enemies.

Can you help Generous Ginger George to save Christmas?

How to play
  • Space - jump
  • A - left
  • D - right
  • J - throw Ginger George pieces
Team
  • Emil (limered) - Programming
  • Sven (justsWn) - Programming
  • Michi (ryupold) - Programming
  • Helen - Content Creator, Sound

Have fun playing our little game and Merry Christmas from Germany!
